name: Drive (Akan)
description:
It`s simple indie project, which I made for couple months. Games has two minigames: in first game you catch "bugs", in second you drive car and collect parcels. Game also has three translate languages: English, Russian,

Ukrainian.

Game OST:

Aero - Love 808

Tayken - Love 808

Sun - Love 808

Controls: LMB - catch "bug", W A S D - ride a car.

Enjoy :)

- Akan
